src_original: eṣa dṛṣṭva jaravyādhipīḍitān prāṇino duṣkhaśatair upadrutān /
jñānavajramayam eṣa te dṛḍhaṃ duṣkhayantragaticakrabhedanaṃ //  [ Bendall ed p102 ---> ]
mohavidyagahanâśayaṃ jagat prajñacakṣuhata naṣṭadaiśikaṃ /  tasya kṣema diśa-
śūrasūtâbhayasya dāyako daiśako hi jagato bhaviṣyati //
śuddhi vartti trimalattamo 'py ahaṃ maitrisneha smṛtibhājanaṃ dṛḍham /
